description: Number of intersting (vector) layers in East Africa, contains also env data ( mostly RS), agri watch (https://agriculturehotspots.icpac.net/)

label: Landportal
description: The Land Portal looks link to many data sources, not nessary in KE, ET or RW, tends ot be on global scale. There are only 16 spatail layers (https://landportal.org/book/layers) . Interesting is LandVoc 2.0 integrated with AgroVoc

label: Kenia Ag Observatory platform
description: Implemented by KALRO: Climate, Ag advisory and insights

label: Decision Support Modeling Tools for Ethiopia (DSMT-E)
description: Suite of decision support tools for food security and development planning in Ethiopia. Hihg profile partners, difficult to get inot the platform.

label: Sen2Agri
description: Near real-time agriculture monitoring at national scale at parcel resolution: Performance assessment of the Sen2-Agri automated system in various cropping systems around the world. Here is an example of implmentation: , https://eodc.eu/services/sen2agri/

label: Agrism
description: Basded in SA? Looks like neat tool tuned for crop management

label: ACADIA
description: Agroindustry market orientation curricula, accessibility of education (distance learning), agricultural productivity, fostering entrepreneurship and cooperative work on agroindustry sector. PDF file is compilation of studies that can be found in publications online; might be interesting?

label: TWIGA
description: Provide currently unavailable geo-information on weather, water and climate for sub-Saharan Africa by enhancing satellite-based geo-data with innovative in situ sensors and developing related information services that answer needs of African stakeholders and the GEOSS community.

label: GAEZ v4
description: Attainable crop yields, soil suitability

label: ISIMIP
description: Climate [change] data

label: WAPOR
description: Climate and water productivity data

description: Includes soil data

description: R scripts, data (soil, crop)

label: AfSIS ltd
description: R scripts, data (soil, crop); Markus

description: R scripts, data (soil, crop)

label: ATA
description: Refers to data (doesn't include)

description: Ref to 30m data layers incl. ISDA soil

description: Ref to 100m-10km data layers

label: CIESIN
description: High res population density

description: aims at providing climatic/meteorological and hydrological information

description: A gateway to data and information on Africa's social, economic, territorial and environmental development, developed by the Joint Research Centre

label: MapSPAM, IFPRI
description: Spatial Production Allocation Model; crop area distributions

label: GYGA
description: Technology extrapolation domains

label: QED
description: Maps

label: ISRIC
description: World soil information, africa soil information

label: OECD
description: Agricultural statistics

label: FAOSTAT
description: Agricultural statistics

label: EDACaP (EIAR)
description: EDACaP is an innovative digital web-platform for decision-support and learning, providing interactive AgroClimate information and advisory to improve crop management decisions and reduce production risks associated with climate variability and change

label: AICCRA
description: AICCRA makes climate information services and climate-smart agriculture more accessible to smallholder farmers across Africa with better access to technology and advisory services—linked to information about effective response measures—farmers can better anticipate climate-related events to take preventative action.

label: SERVIR (NASA)
description: SERVIR connects space to village...by helping developing countries use satellite data to address critical challenges in food security, water resources, weather and climate, land use, and disasters. (Other link: www.nasa.gov/mission_pages/servir/index.html).

label: ESSA
description: Earth observation and environmental sensing for climate-smart sustainable agropastoral ecosystem transformation in East Africa - ESSA project aims to contribute to the pastoralist households’ transition towards climate-smart agropastoral systems in Ethiopia and Kenya.

label: ICSIAPI
description: The Integrated & Climate Smart Innovations for Agro-pastoralist Economies and Landscapes in Kenya's ASAL (ICSIAPL) project

label: ProSilience
description: ProSilience: Enhancing soils and agroecology for resilient agri-food systems in Sub-Saharan Africa

label: CRAFT
description: The CCAFS Regional Agricultural Forecasting Toolbox (CRAFT) is a software platform designed for yield forecasting at spatial resolutions of either 5 or 30 arc-minutes using an ensemble modeling approach. Currently, the DSSAT, APSIM, and SARRA-H crop simulation models have been implemented for nine important food and feed crops using the AgMIP IT tools. CGIAR.

label: AGRHYMET
description: Specialized agency of the Permanent Inter-State Committee against Drought in the Sahel (CILSS). (www.agrhymet.ne is broken link)

label: Climate Adaptation Services (CAS)
description: Interactive agricultural climate atlas for two counties. (https://www.climate-atlas.ke/)

label: DigitalAgriHub
description: The Digital Agri Hub tracks the development of the digital agriculture (D4Ag) sector in low- and middle- income countries. Acting as a multi-actor knowledge broker and matchmaking platform, the Hub focuses on leveraging inclusive digital solutions for development and provides a unique perspective for scaling up and investing in digital agricultural innovations

label: World Agroforestry - Research Data Repository
description: Data incl. soil data

label: SPAM
description: IFPRI's Spatial Production Allocation Model (SPAM, also known as MapSPAM) uses a cross-entropy approach to make plausible estimates of crop distribution within disaggregated units.

label: CPCN
description: Soil fertility and crop nutrition data (crop nutrient uptake)
